1.speaker: A
sentence: When was the last time you got a medical checkup?
언제가 마지막이죠 너가 건강 검진을 받은게?

2.speaker: B
sentence: Two months ago, I get it at my company every year.

3.speaker: A
sentence: How did it go this time?

4.speaker: B
sentence: Not good. My blood pressure went up a bit.
좋지 않아요. 내 혈압이 올랐어요 조금.

5.speaker: A
sentence: You've been under a lot of stress lately.

6.speaker: B
sentence: I should take good care of my health.
난 해야해 각별해 보살펴야해 내 건강을.
